author: nc1234
content: Now that all the EIP-7549 related apis are merged. Shall we have a new release (alpha or whatnot) of the beacon api spec?

author: jgm
content: There was a brief discussion about this at https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/710831784991916072/1253318472692269066 I still think we need to bump the version number as we're changing the format of the data.

author: nflaig
content: We could introduce pre-releases, is anyone else running spec tests and would benefit from a pinned version?
